Detailed Description

Packet used for requesting a map from the map modules.

Until the maps contain information about the overview maps the reader should write the overview map id into the pixel width field if the request is a routemap request.

After the normal header this packet contains
PosSizeComment
HEADER_SIZE 4 bytes map ID (included in the RequestPacket)
+4 1 byte maptype
+5 1 byte zoomlevel
+8 4 byte mapVersion
+12 4 byte mapGeneratorVersion
+16 4 byte number of overview maps (If route)
+20 4 byte first overview map (if route)

Used by the constructors. Also makes some room for the overview maps.
